name: Validate that the web user is able to perform flight bookings

testSteps.description: Example #1: {Departing From=Acapulco, On Month=November, On Day=10, Arriving In=Frankfurt, Returning Month=November, Returning Day=17, Airline=Blue Skies Airlines}

children.description: Given I am a web user who navigates to the NewTours website
Launch browser and navigate to test URL
Log: the browser is successfully launched.
When I provide valid username as "newuserfeb2019" and password as "Welcome1!"
Enter registered user details: newuserfeb2019, Welcome1!
Then the user successfully logs in and is able to see the bookings page
Is flight finder page displayed
And provides "Acapulco" , "November" , "10"
Enter origin location booking details: Acapulco, November, 10
And provides "Frankfurt" , "November" , "17" , "Blue Skies Airlines"
Enter arriving location booking details: Frankfurt, November, 17, Blue Skies Airlines
Then the user is able to successfully make the booking
User proceeds with booking
Log: The user has successfully made Flight bookings.
Log: view the following screenshot: /src/test/resources/files/screenshots/Booking confirmation_02022019_134450.png

testSteps.description: Example #2: {Departing From=London, On Month=December, On Day=20, Arriving In=New York, Returning Month=December, Returning Day=30, Airline=Unified Airlines}

children.description: Given I am a web user who navigates to the NewTours website
Launch browser and navigate to test URL
Log: the browser is successfully launched.
When I provide valid username as "newuserfeb2019" and password as "Welcome1!"
Enter registered user details: newuserfeb2019, Welcome1!
Then the user successfully logs in and is able to see the bookings page
Is flight finder page displayed
And provides "London" , "December" , "20"
Enter origin location booking details: London, December, 20
And provides "New York" , "December" , "30" , "Unified Airlines"
Enter arriving location booking details: New York, December, 30, Unified Airlines
Then the user is able to successfully make the booking
User proceeds with booking
Log: The user has successfully made Flight bookings.
Log: view the following screenshot: /src/test/resources/files/screenshots/Booking confirmation_02022019_134456.png

userStory.storyName: The NewTours website is used for flight bookings.

featureTag.name: Features/The NewTours website is used for flight bookings.

title: Validate that the web user is able to perform flight bookings

tags.name: The NewTours website is used for flight bookings.

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am a web user who navigates to the NewTours website
When I provide valid username as "newuserfeb2019" and password as "Welcome1!"
Then the user successfully logs in and is able to see the bookings page
And provides "<Departing From>" , "<On Month>" , "<On Day>"
And provides "<Arriving In>" , "<Returning Month>" , "<Returning Day>" , "<Airline>"
Then the user is able to successfully make the booking
